author: Napoleon Hill
message: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
title: Thought of the day

author: Henry Ford
message: If you think you can, you can. And if you think you can't, you're right.
title: Thought of the day

author: St. Augustine
message: Better to have loved and lost, than to have never loved at all.
title: Thought of the day

author: Leo Tolstoy
message: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
title: Thought of the day
